name: 本杰明·富兰克林
bio_short: 美国开国元勋、博学家、发明家和物理学家。他提出了“电荷守恒”定律，通过“风筝实验”证明了闪电是电，发明了“避雷针”，并绘制了第一张“湾流”图。
bio_short_en: A Founding Father of the United States, polymath, inventor, and physicist. He proposed the 'Conservation of Charge', proved lightning is electricity with his 'kite experiment', and charted the 'Gulf Stream'.
